title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: Upon restarting the workbench, the Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is empty.
EB: Upon restarting the workbench, the MRU file list should contain the files that were opened in the previous session.
SR: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench and observe the MRU file list.
